Judul: ANALISIS PERBAIKAN STABILITAS SISTEM TENAGA DENGAN   KENDALI OPTIMAL BERBASIS PERGESERAN NILAI-EIGEN   MATRIKS JERAT TERTUTUP
Abstrak: One of Effort that done to improve electric power system stability is with to use optimal control theory. Fundamental of optimal control theory is optimalisation perfomance of work index. The problem will be taken if to find the work index is how to finding the element of matrix Q and R. One of some methode to find the element of Q and R matrix is dominant shifting eigen-value methode. Fundamental principe of dominant shifting eigen-value methode is shifting eigen-value to left hand on the complex area but no exceed to margin that permissible limit and which shifted real part only. I mplementation of the dominant shifting eigen-value methode on electric power system that basically to 4`h orde of polynomial equation showed element of matrix Q will change with shifting eigen-value of close loop matrix.
Kata Kunci: Optimal control, improve of power system stability
